content:
There are many great restaurants and cafes in Conwy you can choose from! Here are some recommendations:

1. Watson's Bistro - This award-winning restaurant specializes in seafood dishes and locally sourced ingredients, and has a great view of the castle.

2. The Castle Hotel - This historic hotel has a cozy lounge and pub-style restaurant, serving traditional Welsh cuisine and local beer.

3. The Coracle - This charming cafe serves homemade cakes, coffee, and light meals, and has an outdoor seating area overlooking the river.

4. The Erskine Arms - This gastropub serves delicious pub food with a modern twist, using locally sourced ingredients. It's also located in the heart of Conwy.

5. Conwy Mussel Company - If you love seafood, be sure to visit the Conwy Mussel Company for fresh, locally sourced mussels and seafood dishes.

I hope this list helps you find some great food options during your visit to Conwy!
